organizations: London Film Festival Screenwriter James Vanderbilt

thread.title: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival
thread.title_full: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival

title: 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival
text:
> Entertainment 'Chevalier' named best picture at London Film Festival Screenwriter James Vanderbilt poses with partner Amber Freeman upon arrival at the premiere of the film "Truth", as part of the London film festival in London, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Photo by Vianney Le Caer/Invision/AP)
